body: Concept ACK to enforce the void return type on threads
Concept ACK on the first two commits, ~0 on https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19064/commits/2a816bd79093eac7d0bbae3106fdd7fddbc99cf2 as I don't see the cited improvements justifying the change.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19779 (Remove gArgs global from init by MarcoFalke)
* #19245 ([WIP DONOTMERGE] Replace boost::filesystem with std::filesystem (in c++17) by kiminuo)
* #18242 (Add BIP324 encrypted p2p transport de-/serializer (only used in tests) by jonasschnelli)
* #18077 (net: Add NAT-PMP port forwarding support by hebasto)
* #17786 (refactor: Nuke policy/fees->mempool circular dependencies by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

As you move this anyway, what about moving threadnames.h to thread.h and adding this to that file? Advantage would be that stuff like `src/index/base.cpp` that doesn't need the whole system.h can just include the slim thread.h

Updated 2a816bd79093eac7d0bbae3106fdd7fddbc99cf2 -> bcd04708a6fe32cf7fba2969ec378c34e6950278 ([pr19064.01](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr19064.01) -> [pr19064.03](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr19064.03), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr19064.01..pr19064.03)):

- addressed @MarcoFalke's [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19064#discussion_r431512796):
> As you move this anyway, what about moving threadnames.h to thread.h and adding this to that file? Advantage would be that stuff like `src/index/base.cpp` that doesn't need the whole system.h can just include the slim thread.h
Based on the circular dependency and what this function does (Run a thread with log statements), maybe this is better suited in `logging.h`? No strong opinion, so feel free to not move this at all.
Maybe keep `threadnames.{h,cpp}` _and_ move `TraceThread()` to new `thread.{h,cpp}`?
Sure if that works. Cutting down the util/system bloat can't hurt.

Updated bcd04708a6fe32cf7fba2969ec378c34e6950278 -> 90aa1f7f503818a67d18ec20401707d5e4ca658d ([pr19064.03](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr19064.03) -> [pr19064.04](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr19064.04), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr19064.03..pr19064.04)):

- fixed circular dependencies
[Updated](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19064#issuecomment-636361588).
